title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: How Disinformation About the Minnesota Shooting Spread Like Wildfire on X
items.description: Under Elon Musk’s leadership, X has become the perfect platform to supercharge the spread of dangerous disinformation during breaking news events.

items.title: Netflix CPO Eunice Kim joins TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to talk scaling product and reimagining entertainment

items.title: The Instagram iPad App Is Finally Here
items.description: Now you can doomscroll on a bigger screen.

items.title: Venezuela’s president thinks American spies can’t hack Huawei phones
items.description: Huawei phones, given their custom hardware and operating system, may actually be easier to hack than other brands.

items.title: How to watch Apple announce the iPhone 17
items.description: Apple is debuting the iPhone 17 at its annual hardware event on September 9.

items.title: Best Action Cameras (2025), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: Gearing up to shred the slopes or dive into the seas? These photography tools are made for danger.

items.title: How to Switch From iPhone to Android (2025)
items.description: If you’re leaving Apple behind to try Google’s Pixel, a Samsung Galaxy, or another Android phone, this guide covers all your bases.

items.title: Roblox expands use of age estimation tech and introduces standardized ratings
items.description: Roblox says it's expanding its use of age estimation technology and entering a partnership with the International Age Rating Coalition (IARC) to stand...

items.title: Instagram is finally launching an iPad app
items.description: Instagram is finally launching an iPad app after years of users asking the company to make one.

items.title: Best Smokeless Firepits (2025), Tested for Fun and Fresh Air
items.description: These burning rings of fire (but less smoke) will make your patio a party, and your jacket less smelly.
